document.full_text: judy rosenblatt, starring in this revival about peggy guggenheim, a rich woman who did what she wanted, has the most important quality for the solo role: attitude.
document.title: theater review | 'woman before a glass': she loved herself, yes, but she also loved art
lines_and_colors: judy rosenblatt, starring in this revival about peggy guggenheim, a rich woman who did what she wanted, has the most important quality for the solo role: attitude.
